name: KVIST
description:
A wall mounted, four bulb, brass luminaire

This solid brass fixture features adjustable friction joints to allow for various alternative arrangements. Mounts easily to the wall with cast iron brackets and comes with drywall screws for installation. Meticulously hand crafted in Brooklyn, NY as per your order.

DIMENSIONS: 38” T x 25 ½” W x up to 15” D

Raw brass- will age beautifully over time
Ceramic socket for standard bulbs
Light bulbs included: Four 40W frosted tube bulbs
10’ cloth coated cord with inline switch and US plug, multiple additional options

ADDITIONAL OPTIONS: Please contact
-Blackened, Verdigris or Chrome body
-Alternative bulb options
-Number of lights
-Size and configuration
-Candelabra bulbs for a delicate glow

Suitable for Interior use.
Need a large order? Looking for a something I don’t have? Let me know.
Made to order- will typically ship within 2 weeks.

name: BLIXT
description:
A chrome, five bulb, pendant:

The fixture is made of the highest quality solid brass, coated with a polished nickel (looks like chrome). Several joint are adjustable for various alternate arrangements. Installs to a ceiling junction box (or a custom plug version is available). Meticulously hand crafted in Brooklyn, NY as per your order.

DIMENSIONS:
24” x 48”x 24”T

Polished Nickle finish.
Ceramic socket for standard bulbs
Light bulbs INCLUDED: Five 40W frosted tube bulbs

name: SLÄNGA
description:
A wall mounted, projecting luminaire

This fixture propels a colorful, caged light into the middle of the room. The arm swings to maneuver the illumination over where you need it. Add additional limbs as well. Comes with drywall screws and all the hardware for installation. Meticulously hand crafted in Brooklyn, NY as per your order.

DIMENSIONS: height varies upon mounting
84” T x 6” W x 48” D

-60W frosted tube bulb INCLUDED
-5' galvanized steel arm
-9’ black cloth coated cord with inline switch and US plug
-Clear glass globe
-Die-cast aluminum cage and housing
-Rubber gaskets

-Dimmable

name: EKO
description:
A colorful domed pendent lamp

A color of your choice on the outside and polished stainless steel (looks like chrome) reflects the light inside for a directional light perfect for over a table or the accent of a room. Installs to a ceiling junction box- or a custom plug version is available. Meticulously hand crafted in Brooklyn, NY as per your order.

DIMENSIONS:
14 1/4” Diameter x 6 1/2” T reflector

-EXTERIOR: Choice of color
-INTERIOR: Highly polished stainless steel reflector (looks like chrome)
-Polished nickle socket and hardware (looks like chrome)
-Antique filament 40 W globe bulb INCLUDED
-3' black, cloth covered cord with canopy hanging kit

ADDITIONAL OPTION: Please contact
-Plug-in version with 15' cord

Suitable for Interior only
